_sText:
*********************************** 
Counter-Strike: Source
*********************************** 
TITLE**: de_salty_2fort_v1
AUTHOR**: Tattoo 
E-MAIL**: tattoo@saltwaterclan.com
WEBSITE: http://www.saltwaterclan.com 

FILENAME: de_salty_2fort_v1.bsp
de_salty_2fort_v1.nav 
FILESIZE: 3.76 mb
209 kb 

CREDITS**: I make all our maps and have a number of them. If you like them stop by our server(204.17.65.211:27015). 


DESCRIPTION**: This is a map I created to duplicate the famous 2fort map in TFC. There are a few modifications but for the most part it is pretty close. The objective is to blow up the control room in the CT's basement. There are a few ways to get the from water, ladders, or ramps. The map is a duplicate on each side. This will help you find you way around. in the front upper forts, in the center, I have placed two AWP's. This is a fun sniping map! To make sure the bots don't get stuck in the water I have place a teleport on either end under the bridge. Pretty funny, someone can just show up in front of you if there is a firefight on the bridge.
